overview: "Agua en mis bolsillos" is the title of the short / documentary about the Argentine band Copiloto Pilato from the late 80s, made by Claudio Agosto. Filmed and edited on VHS in 1992, mastered by Fuga Crew in 2015. Contains images of live shows with original audio, rehearsals and videos.  Copiloto Pilato released a single album in 1992 entitled "La Misma Tierra"
title: Agua en mis bolsillos
